item.title: Python In A Hurry
item.description: This is the whole python references in one place. Table of Contents List Tuple Set Dictionary Comparison of Data Types String Methods Python Try Except Python Iterators Built In Functions Datetime Formats List List items are ordered, changeable, and allow duplicate values. Ordered When we say that lists are ordered, it means that the items have a defined order, and that order will not change. If you add new items to a list, the new items will be placed at the end of the list.
